name: KaijuGamejam2 - City Destroying Game
description:
My entry to the KaijuJam2! It's a city destruction game! 

You must destroy all of the cities. The cities include All buildings and trees too. There are billboard signs outside each city you'll know if you fully destroyed it by looking at the signs. Hitting buildings will send people running scared from you! To regain health you must stomp on the people! The game is hard I didn't have a ton of play testing. The middle two cities are the hardest to take on so be careful.

Post submission note: after playing it again my self I found out the controller controls are busted I'm not sure why. Also noticed the city billboards weren't working I must've bugged them last second. I'll make a post gam jam update down the line to fix these things.

Controls!

Mouse&Keyboard

Camera : Mouse

Punch Combo : left mouse button 

Butt Slam : Space Bar

Pause : ESC or P

Move : W A S D

Controller

Camera : Right Tumbstick

Punch Combo : X -> Xbox     Square -> Playstation

Butt Slam : A -> Xbox     X -> Playstation

Move : Left Thumbstick

Pause : Pause Button

Controller doesn't have support in the menus I ran out of time to implement that! I'm Sorry!

NOTE!!

There was crazy weather were I live had to deal with Tornados touching down and it really distracted me during the game jam. In total I'd say I got about 8 Full work days of time put into this game jam so don't be to harsh! I ran out of time for so so so much on this just being too distracted by the awful weather and my ADHD! Anyways I hope you enjoy!
